languages.text: {n}Фиделио стоит в обычной позе сервитора, глаза устремлены в одну точку. Только хваты металлической конечности слегка подрагивают — может, от неисправности, может, от задушенных, ищущих путь прорваться чувств.{/n}

{n}Fidelio is standing in a typical servitor pose, eyes staring into space. Only the grips of its metallic appendage are trembling slightly — perhaps caused by a malfunction, or perhaps by suppressed emotions looking for release.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Фиделио стоит в обычной позе сервитора, глаза устремлены в одну точку. Только хваты металлической конечности слегка подрагивают — может, от неисправности, может, от задушенных, ищущих путь прорваться чувств.{/n}

languages.text: {n}菲迪奥以机仆惯有的姿势站在那里，双眼盯着虚空。它的金属抓钩微微颤抖着，或许是因为发生了故障，也或许是它压抑已久的情绪渴求释放。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Fidelio is standing in a typical servitor pose, eyes staring into space. Only the grips of its metallic appendage are trembling slightly — perhaps caused by a malfunction, or perhaps by suppressed emotions looking for release.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}菲迪奥以奴工惯有的姿势站在那里，双眼盯着虚空。它的金属抓钩微微颤抖着，或许是因为发生了故障，也或许是它压抑已久的情绪渴求释放。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fidelio espera en la típica pose de servidor, mirando al vacío. Sin embargo, las sujeciones de su extremidad metálica tiemblan ligeramente, tal vez por un error mecánico o tal vez por emociones contenidas que no puede desatar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Fidelio is standing in a typical servitor pose, eyes staring into space. Only the grips of its metallic appendage are trembling slightly — perhaps caused by a malfunction, or perhaps by suppressed emotions looking for release.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fidelio espera en la típica pose de servidor, mirando al vacío. Sin embargo, las sujeciones de su extremidad metálica tiemblan ligeramente, tal vez por un error mecánico o tal vez por emociones contenidas que no puede desatar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}フィデリオは典型的なサーヴィターの姿勢で立っており、目は宙を見つめている。金属製の腕のグリップだけがわずかに震えている。故障によるものか、あるいは抑圧された感情を解放しようとしているのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Fidelio is standing in a typical servitor pose, eyes staring into space. Only the grips of its metallic appendage are trembling slightly — perhaps caused by a malfunction, or perhaps by suppressed emotions looking for release.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}フィデリオは典型的なサーヴィターの姿勢で立っており、目は宙を見つめている。金属製の腕のグリップだけがわずかに震えている。故障によるものか、あるいは抑圧された感情を解放しようとしているのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fidelio steht in typischer Servitor-Pose, den Blick in die Ferne gerichtet. Nur die Greifer der Metallgliedmaßen zittern leicht – vielleicht aufgrund einer Fehlfunktion, vielleicht wegen unterdrückter Emotionen, die sich Bahn brechen wollen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Fidelio is standing in a typical servitor pose, eyes staring into space. Only the grips of its metallic appendage are trembling slightly — perhaps caused by a malfunction, or perhaps by suppressed emotions looking for release.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fidelio steht in typischer Servitor-Pose, den Blick in die Ferne gerichtet. Nur die Greifer der Metallgliedmaßen zittern leicht – vielleicht aufgrund einer Fehlfunktion, vielleicht wegen unterdrückter Emotionen, die sich Bahn brechen wollen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Figée dans la position typique des servitors, Fidélio a toujours les yeux perdus dans le vide, mais les jointures de ses appendices métalliques tremblent légèrement. Vous ignorez s'il s'agit là d'un dysfonctionnement ou de la manifestation d'un trop-plein d'émotions réprimées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Fidelio is standing in a typical servitor pose, eyes staring into space. Only the grips of its metallic appendage are trembling slightly — perhaps caused by a malfunction, or perhaps by suppressed emotions looking for release.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Figée dans la position typique des servitors, Fidélio a toujours les yeux perdus dans le vide, mais les jointures de ses appendices métalliques tremblent légèrement. Vous ignorez s'il s'agit là d'un dysfonctionnement ou de la manifestation d'un trop-plein d'émotions réprimées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fidelio, tipik hizmetör pozunda dikiliyor, gözleri boşluğa bakıyor. Yalnızca metal uzuvlarının kavrayıcıları hafifçe titriyor, o kadar. Belki bir arızadan belki de serbest kalmayı bekleyen bastırılmış duygulardan.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Fidelio is standing in a typical servitor pose, eyes staring into space. Only the grips of its metallic appendage are trembling slightly — perhaps caused by a malfunction, or perhaps by suppressed emotions looking for release.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Fidelio, tipik servitör pozunda dikiliyor. Gözleri boşluğa bakıyor. Metal uzuvlarının kavrayıcıları hafifçe titriyor. Bunun sebebi belki bir arıza, belki de serbest kalmayı bekleyen bastırılmış duygular olabilir.{/n}
